CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Submitted for Review stage positioned above or below the Artworks Created stage?
SRP.A: The Submitted for Review stage is positioned {below} the Artworks Created stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Displayed in Exhibition?
VE.A: The value of stage Displayed in Exhibition is {40%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Submitted for Review?
VE.A: The value of stage Submitted for Review is {66%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Artworks Created, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Shortlisted for Acquisition, with a value of {32%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Submitted for Review to stage Approved for Exhibition?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Submitted for Review to stage Approved for Exhibition is {10%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Approved for Exhibition to stage Displayed in Exhibition?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Approved for Exhibition to stage Displayed in Exhibition is {16%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Displayed in Exhibition to stage Shortlisted for Acquisition?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Displayed in Exhibition to stage Shortlisted for Acquisition is {8%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 61%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Artworks Created} stage has {100%}, the {Submitted for Review} stage has {66%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 61%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Approved for Exhibition} stage has {56%}, the {Displayed in Exhibition} stage has {40%}, the {Shortlisted for Acquisition} stage has {32%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 48% and 61%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Artworks Created to Submitted for Review, or from stage Submitted for Review to Approved for Exhibition?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Artworks Created} to {Submitted for Review} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Displayed in Exhibition to Shortlisted for Acquisition, from stage Submitted for Review to Approved for Exhibition, or from stage Artworks Created to Submitted for Review?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Artworks Created} to stage {Submitted for Review} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Artworks Created} and {Submitted for Review} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Displayed in Exhibition} and {Shortlisted for Acquisition} stages.
